amendatorysection.catchline: Commercial motor vehicle; increase of gross vehicle weight; where allowed.
amendatorysection.para: No owner of a commercial motor vehicle shall be permitted to increase the gross vehicle weight for which such commercial motor vehicle is registered except at the office of the county treasurer or designated county official in the county where such commercial motor vehicle is currently registered unless the need for such increase occurs when such commercial motor vehicle is more than one hundred miles from the county seat of such county, unless authorized to do so by the Nebraska State Patrol or authorized state scale examiner as an emergency.
